description:
## D.O.C.
DOC, for Document of Cartoons, is an archive of past artworks and model sheets. The name derives from Cartoon Network's DOC, which served the same purpose but focused on concept art instead of general artwork.

artwork.title: 3k Views
artwork.description: Fall was starting at the time I had gotten 3k views. Meanwhile, somebody asked if Zack was naked in this drawing. I said "yes" and everyone freaked out. xD

artwork.title: 4k Views
artwork.description: My views in DeviantART kept going up.

artwork.title: At the Beach
artwork.description: I wrote a complete story behind this picture that I completely forgot. He had an eye patch because I wasn't good at drawing eyes, at the time.

artwork.title: Beach time
artwork.description: Voices of Summer is a DJ Mix by DJ GT & Project C that I listened to a lot back then. Both this and At the Beach were drawn during the summer.

artwork.title: Fried Brain
artwork.description: I had recently started school at this point and I was getting burnt quite frequently. xD

artwork.title: Is it Christmas Yet?
artwork.description: This was originally a flash that I turned into a wallpaper because I loved it so much.

artwork.title: Me as a Fox
artwork.description: The first version of what would later become Zack. I forgot why I gave him gloves.

artwork.title: Megawolf
artwork.description: A gift for Megawolf because I loved his artwork. I don't think we had becomes friends at this point. Done entirely in paint.

artwork.title: Mega
artwork.description: At this point, Megawolf and I were friends and I started referring to him as "Mega".

artwork.title: Mom & Dad
artwork.description: For a short time, Zack was a cat-fox hybrid because the way I drew him resembled more of a cat even though he had a fox-like tail.

artwork.title: Cookie Girl
artwork.description: Take Angelica from Rugrats and increase her cookie obsession up to 11.

artwork.title: 4th of July
artwork.description: The idea originated from Coshi Dragonite's [We salute to Red White Blue](https://www.deviantart.com/coshi-dragonite/art/We-salute-to-Red-White-Blue-20135862) and it turned into it a tradition for a while. XD

artwork.title: Alex
artwork.description: A furry version of my younger half-brother who is much older now. I never really got to evolve his character because we moved.

artwork.title: Coding
artwork.description: While not the only reason, it did contribute to me getting out of web development until [Blazor: WebAssembly](https://dotnet.microsoft.com/apps/aspnet/web-apps/blazor).

artwork.title: Cirria
artwork.description: A furry version of a cat I use to have.

artwork.title: Aidan v1 Model Sheet
artwork.description: Aidan Cheddar initially started off as a mouse version of Zack.

artwork.title: Aidan v3 Model Sheet
artwork.description: Version 3 is the modern and still current version of Aidan Cheddar that was heavily inspired by my ex-bf who lived in Ireland.

artwork.title: Aqua Fox
artwork.description: The first version of Zack with super powers.

artwork.title: Furry Blue DJ Website
artwork.description: Made in Microsoft Frontpage, The Furry Blue DJ was meant to showcase my artwork. It never came to fruitarian because my HDD gave out.

artwork.title: Furry Blue DJ v2 Website
artwork.description: Version 2 of Furry Blue DJ website continued with the idea of showcasing my art but with broader dreams of making it more like my own personal DeviantART. The homepage reflected that but it was all updated manually. This - right now - is that dream finally coming to life.

artwork.title: Furry Blue DOC
artwork.description: Furry Blue DOC was the spiritual successor to the [Furry Blue DJ](/gallery/doc/4124198d-5289-4a24-aa06-49f1e4d3204d) website meant as an archive of my past works. It had many iterations, improvements, and was put onto a lot of free static web hosts because I didn't have to worry about the content changing over time.

artwork.title: Brain Dead
artwork.description: And an early attempt at a neck.

artwork.title: A Chibi
artwork.description: Well, to the best of my ability at the time. xD
